### [tahabasri/snippets: Supercharge your Snippets in VS Code — Manage your code snippets without quitting your editor.](https://github.com/tahabasri/snippets)
Supercharge your Snippets in VS Code — Manage your code snippets without quitting your editor.
ㅤ
### [TypeScript Origins: The Documentary - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U6s2pdxebSo)
TypeScript Origins: The Documentary features core contributors and community members like Anders Hejlsberg, Steve Lucco, Luke Hoban, Daniel Rosenwasser, Ryan...
ㅤ
### [Improving responsive data table UX with CSS - DEV Community](https://dev.to/logrocket/improving-responsive-data-table-ux-with-css-2ngi)
Written by Timonwa Akintokun✏️  Data tables are widely used in web design to present organized and... Tagged with css, webdev, ux.
ㅤ
### [GitHub Actions: How to run SSH commands (without third-party actions) | Good Code Smell](https://blog.benoitblanchon.fr/github-action-run-ssh-commands/)
We’ll see how to copy files and execute commands on a remote host from a GitHub Action workflow. Use this technique to deploy your app through SSH.
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 38 of 2023.
